maintainers.name: Sam Warner
maintainers.bio: I am a software developer and consultant working for Black Pepper Software, a software company based in Leamington Spa, England. I'm a recent Computer Science graduate from the University of Warwick, and love all things to do with computers!

maintainers.name: Guy Gastineau
maintainers.bio: I really love Linux and Bash!  I think the only reason I use a window manager is for chrome/firefox. Every other open window on my machine is a terminal.

maintainers.name: Glenn Jackman
maintainers.bio: I've been a command line *nix hacker for over 25 years, very active on Stack Overflow for over 10 years, and am happy to bring my experience to the Exercism community.

maintainers.name: Björn Lindström
maintainers.bio: I've used various Unixes on the desktop for around 20 years, and now work as a systems engineer, mainly with Linux systems. Along the way I've picked up bit of shell script.
